metadata.synopsis: One-liner for the dwarf of the ghost watcher group.
metadata.how_to_trigger: talk to the dwarf of the group at -236, 35, -37

0.speaker: Kydden
0.text: You must have seen loads of ghosts out in the wild. And defeated them, too, I bet!
0.context: NodeContext: Impressed/reassured by the player's presence

1.speaker: Kydden
1.text: Why didn't I stay at the tavern? I could've been five meads deep by now.
1.context: NodeContext: Despairing; would rather be drunk than be terrified by ghosts

2.speaker: Kydden
2.text: I'm just looking for ghosts, all right? I don't want you to make me into one.
2.context: NodeContext: Very anxious; scared of the player

3.speaker: Kydden
3.text: Oh, it's... you. I-I think I'm gonna take my chances with the ghosts.
3.context: NodeContext: Very anxious; scared of the player

4.speaker: Kydden
4.text: I feel a lot safer now you're here - these ghosts wouldn't dare try anything!
4.context: NodeContext: Relieved/reassured by the player's presence

5.speaker: Kydden
5.text: Oh gods, I can feel them all around me! Ghosts! Like a horrible, slimy breeze!
5.context: NodeContext: Panicky; convinced he's surrounded by (likely malevolent) ghosts
